D2000000 00000000
{(Activate when you inhale something)
X+R= Fire
X+Left= Spark
X+Right= Cutter
Y+R= Sword
Y+Up = Fireball
Y+Left= Laser
Y+Right= Mike
L+Up= Wheel
L+A= Hammer
L+Left= Parasol
L+Right= Sleep
R+Up= Needle
R+A= Ice
R+Left= Freeze
R+Right= Hi-Jump
Left+UP= Beam
Left = Stone
Right+Up= Ball
Right = Tornado
A+Up= Crash
A = Light
A+Left= Back-Drop
A+Right= Throw
R = U.F.O}
